this method send the messages to the other users
Server - Class in com.Server
This class is in charge to make the connection with the clients

This class is in charge to receive the information and comunicate it to the other clients

This method is in charge to set the username into the name variable
startserver() - Method in class com.Server.Server
This method accept the client connection and add the new client into a list

This class is responsible for welcoming users as well as providing instructions.
